title: Will LoL be at Pax Aus this year?
body:
I've seen several posts  last year and a few at the start of this year saying that League of legends **Won't be at Pax**, however on the schedule for pax Australia, At 6pm on the Second day (Saturday) it says there is a League of Legends event, i'm  not quite sure about this and it would be great if somebody could quickly come along and clarify this.
thanks!

replies.body: This is a PC tournament being held there, unfortunately Riot/League aren't having a presence as PAX since they have put their focus into their own events such as the OPL event.
